member.name: IWICDevelopRawNotificationCallback.Notify
member.summary: An application-defined callback method used for raw image parameter change notifications.
member.param: A set of IWICDevelopRawNotificationCallback Constants parameter notification flags.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IWICDevelopRawNotificationCallback
member.summary: Exposes a callback method for raw image change nofications.
